body: At 5th level, a wolf shaman may cast summon nature's ally as a standard action when summoning canines, and these summoned creatures gain temporary hit points equal to her druid level. This ability otherwise functions as the bear shaman ability.
name: Totemic Summons
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Animal Shamans/Wolf Shaman/Totemic Summons
